languages.text: "Едва ли процветание людей в интересах ксеноса. Подозреваю, дело в банальном стремлении навязать свое виденье мироустройства".

traits.locale_text: "Едва ли процветание людей в интересах ксеноса. Подозреваю, дело в банальном стремлении навязать свое виденье мироустройства".

languages.text: "It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."
languages.original_text: "Едва ли процветание людей в интересах ксеноса. Подозреваю, дело в банальном стремлении навязать свое виденье мироустройства".

traits.locale_text: "It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."
"It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."
"It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."
"It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."
"It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."
"It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."

languages.text: 「異種族が人類の繁栄を気にかけるとは思えん。結局のところ、お前たちの価値観を他種族に押しつけようとしているだけではないのか？」
languages.original_text: "It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族が人類の繁栄を気にかけるとは思えん。結局のところ、お前たちの価値観を他種族に押しつけようとしているだけではないのか？」

languages.text: "Es wäre doch ungewöhnlich, dass ein Xenos sich um das Wohlergehen der Menschheit sorgt. Ich vermute, das ist lediglich ein Versuch, anderen Spezies Eure Ansichten aufzuzwingen."
languages.original_text: "It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre doch ungewöhnlich, dass ein Xenos sich um das Wohlergehen der Menschheit sorgt. Ich vermute, das ist lediglich ein Versuch, anderen Spezies Eure Ansichten aufzuzwingen."

languages.text: « J'ai du mal à croire qu'une xénos se soucie de la prospérité de l'humanité. Je dirais plutôt que vous tentez simplement d'imposer votre vision des choses à une autre espèce. »
languages.original_text: "It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai du mal à croire qu'une xénos se soucie de la prospérité de l'humanité. Je dirais plutôt que vous tentez simplement d'imposer votre vision des choses à une autre espèce. »

languages.text: «Me parece improbable que una xenos se preocupe por la prosperidad de la Humanidad. Sospecho que se trata de un intento por imponer su perspectiva a otra especie».
languages.original_text: "It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."

traits.locale_text: «Me parece improbable que una xenos se preocupe por la prosperidad de la Humanidad. Sospecho que se trata de un intento por imponer su perspectiva a otra especie».

languages.text: “异形恐怕并不会关心人类的发展。我怀疑，你只不过是想把你们的观点强加给其他物种罢了。”
languages.original_text: "It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."

traits.locale_text: “异形恐怕并不会关心人类的发展。我怀疑，你只不过是想把你们的观点强加给其他物种罢了。”

languages.text: "Zenoların İnsanlığın refahını düşüneceklerini sanmıyorum. Bence kendi görüşlerini diğer türler üzerinden empoze etmenin peşindesin."
languages.original_text: "It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."

traits.locale_text: "Zenoların İnsanlık'ın refahını düşüneceklerini sanmıyorum. Bence kendi görüşlerini diğer türler üzerinden empoze etme peşindesin."

languages.original_text: "It seems unlikely that a xenos would be concerned about Humanity's prosperity. I suspect this is nothing but an attempt to impose your views on other species."
